defaultConfig.name: enable USB
defaultConfig.description: Enable the 4ports USB hub

defaultConfig.name: overscan_left
defaultConfig.description: Move the left margin of the DISPLAY. Negative numbers to move the margin to the left.

defaultConfig.name: overscan_right
defaultConfig.description: Move the right margin of the DISPLAY. Negative numbers to move the margin to the right.

defaultConfig.name: overscan_top
defaultConfig.description: Move the top margin of the DISPLAY. Negative numbers to move the margin to the top.

defaultConfig.name: overscan_bottom
defaultConfig.description: Move the bottom margin of the DISPLAY. Negative numbers to move the margin to the bottom.

defaultConfig.name: enable UART0
defaultConfig.description: Enable the UART0 async serial port

defaultConfig.name: enable UART3
defaultConfig.description: Enable the UART3 async serial port

defaultConfig.name: enable UART4 FlowCtrl
defaultConfig.description: Enable the UART4 serial sync port

defaultConfig.name: enable UART5
defaultConfig.description: Enable the UART4 serial async port. This is the uart used for serial console, see /boot/cmdline.txt ...console=ttyAMA2,115200

defaultConfig.name: Disable BT
defaultConfig.description: Disable to Bluetooth module

defaultConfig.name: BOOT_UART
defaultConfig.description: Enable uarts at boot

defaultConfig.name: Enable TVout
defaultConfig.description: Enable TVout instead of HDMI.

defaultConfig.name: Composite PAL
defaultConfig.description: Set the TVout as PAL.0->NTSC, 1->Japanese NTSC, 2->PAL, 3->Brazilian PAL, 16->Progressive scan NTSC, 17->Progeressive scan PAL

defaultConfig.name: GPU Memory
defaultConfig.description: Set GPU memory size

defaultConfig.name: Start X
defaultConfig.description: Start the GUI manager at boot

defaultConfig.name: Enable DRM VC4 V3D driver
defaultConfig.description: Enable the GPU acceleration driver

defaultConfig.name: Enable Audio
defaultConfig.description: Enable Audio

defaultConfig.name: SPI On
defaultConfig.description: Enable SPI serial interface

defaultConfig.name: I2S On
defaultConfig.description: Enable Inter-IC Sound

defaultConfig.name: I2C On
defaultConfig.description: Enable SPI serial interface
